humanReadableByteCount

public static java.lang.String humanReadableByteCount(long bytes,
                                                      boolean si)
Convert the number of bytes to human readable string.

Parameters:
bytes - the number of bytes
si - use internation system of units of not, true to use 1000, false to use 1024
Returns:
the human readable string of the 'number of bytes'

humanReadableTimeCount

public static java.lang.String humanReadableTimeCount(int timeInSecond,
                                                      int maxDisplay)
Convert the time (in second) to human readable string.

Parameters:
timeInSecond - the time to convert
maxDisplay - indicate the max number of item to display, max: 6, e.g. timeInSecond = 3661, maxDisplay: 2 => 1h 1m
Returns:
the human readable string of the time
